DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator for eligibility with values of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable related to agreement to putting an end to the nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to agreement to putting an end to the nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.

Concepts.definition: The nursing of an infant at the mother's breast.

Property.preferredDefinition: Put an end to a state or an activity.:1. The act of agreeing. 2. Harmony of opinion; accord. (from American Heritage Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Put an end to a state or an activity.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to stop breastfeeding?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will she discontinue nursing prior to the first dose of the study drug and until 1 month after the last study treatment

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC 1603
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to stop breastfeeding for the duration of the study and through 1 week of the last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the subject is lactating, has she agreed not to breastfeed her infants starting with the first dose of study therapy through 5 months after the last dose of study therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If Yes, Has patient agreed to stop breastfeeding?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agreed to stop breastfeeding during treatment with gilteritinib and for 2 months after the last does of gilteritinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient agreed to stop breastfeeding starting with the first dose of study therapy and for at least 6 months after the last dose of rituximab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text  001
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient agreed to stop breastfeeding?
